answerText: plasma[10] A tokamak uses this phenomenon to confine plasmas in a torus shape. Using this phenomenon for confinement is one of the two main branches of fusion research along with inertial confinement.

question: Question: This state of matter consists of charged particles. For 10 points each: [10] Identify this fourth state of matter that is commonly found in stars.
